results.title: Metformin - its anti-cancer effects in hematologic malignancies
results.text_hl: Among the different @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@ analyzed, the beneficial effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@hematological disorders@@@ were reported.

results.title: Association of metformin use and cancer incidence: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Reduced risk for overall @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ was observed in case-control (RR, 0.55; 95% CI, 0.30-0.80) and prospective cohort (RR, 0.65; 95% CI, 0.37-0.93) studies. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use was associated with reduced @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal@@@ (RR, 0.79; 95%CI, 0.73-0.85), @DISEASE_Urologic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014570 @@@urologic@@@ (RR, 0.88; 95%CI, 0.78-0.99), and @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@hematologic@@@ (RR, 0.87; 95%CI, 0.75-0.99) @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ risk.

citations.NLM: O'connor L, Bailey-Whyte M, Bhattacharya M, Buttera G, Hardell KNL, Seidenberg AB, Castle PE, Loomans-Kropp HA. Association of metformin use and cancer incidence: a systematic review and meta-analysis. J Natl Cancer Inst. 2024 Jan 30;():. PMID: 38291943

results.title: Bacteroides ovatus accelerates metformin-induced vitamin B12 deficiency in type 2 diabetes patients by accumulating cobalamin
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@Vitamin B12 (@@@VB12) deficiency, which may lead to @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@hematologic and neurologic symptoms@@@, has been associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use, but the underlying mechanism is unclear.

results.title: Effects of Metformin on Survival and Toxicity in Patients with Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Treated with Nivolumab.
results.text_hl: Conclusions: These findings suggest that concurrent @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use may enhance overall survival but also increase @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@hematologic toxicity@@@, warranting closer monitoring in @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@NSCLC@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving @CHEMICAL_Nivolumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077594 @@@nivolumab@@@.

results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Intense aerobic exercise in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment reduces free-living 72-h @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood hyperglycemic@@@ peaks.

results.title: Pioglitazone reduces blood pressure in non-dipping diabetic patients.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Forty non-dipper @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were randomly assigned to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + placebo (M) or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ 30 mg (MP) and submitted to 24 hours @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure monitoring at the beginning and after 8 weeks.
